thread.title: Bill Paxton dead at 61: Titanic star dies suddenly after complications with surgery
thread.title_full: Bill Paxton dead at 61: Titanic star dies suddenly after complications with surgery

title: Bill Paxton dead at 61: Titanic star dies suddenly after complications with surgery
text:
Bill Paxton dead at 61: Titanic star dies suddenly after complications with surgery Bill Paxton dead at 61: Titanic star dies suddenly after complications with surgery BILL PAXTON has died at 61, according to a report. PUBLISHED: 15:24, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 | UPDATED: 15:32, Sun, Feb 26, 2017 GETTY Bill Paxton dies at 61-years-old 
TMZ claim the actor died suddenly from complications in surgery on Saturday. 
The actor is best known for his roles in film inclusion Twister, Titanic as well as Ridley Scott’s Aliens and won an Emmy Award for Hatfield and McCoys. 
He was currently starring in the CBS series Training Day at the time of his death. 
The movie legend leaves behind his two children and his wife of over 30-years Louise Newbury. 
"It is with heavy hearts we share the news that Bill Paxton has passed away due to complications from surgery,” the family said in a statement. 
More on this story to follow…
